name: Black Diamond Trail Cork Poles - Women's
description: Add efficiency to your stride. These 4-season trekking poles have cork grips that are easy to handle and don't feel slick in hot weather.Women's specific design has smaller grips and a slightly shorter overall length compared to unisex poles.Natural cork grips wick away sweat.Non-slip foam extension grip allows you to move your hand down on steep or sloping terrain.Padded webbing straps are left- and right-hand specific.FlickLock adjustment mechanisms.Interchangeable Carbide tech tips can be changed or swapped out.Includes low-profile Trekking Baskets and larger Powder Baskets.
